class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


This is not for complete beginners. This is a beginning/intermediate modern dance course. Previous dance experience is encouraged.
course_description: This course builds on the technical skills for advanced beginners. Emphasis is placed on centering, core support, breath support, full articulation of the body in three-dimensional space, fully integrating concepts of parallel and rotation, and the interplay of stability and mobility.
prerequisites: PE_OX 141 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4200, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: A. Abarca, Status: Open
